author: Ike Wiseman

text: The 3rd entry in the Jazz Jackrabbit franchise which was unreleased due to Epic not finding any publishers for it. I know the Alpha version was released on the net, but I'm just glad we got to check out Alexander Brandon's work on it, he never disappoints. He must have composed this soundtrack right before Deus Ex and the pads at 1:40 is definitely reminiscent of that game. Head bumpin' track!
